snippet.title: Dynasty Warriors 9 - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Only one more day until launch!

DYNASTY WARRIORS 9 is coming February 13, 2018 on the PS4 , Xbox One, PC Steam.

Have you pre-ordered the game?

Pre-order Bonus:
Comprised of seven costumes for fan-favorite characters, the bundle includes an imposing Beijing opera-style costume for Zhao Yun and six costumes inspired by traditional Chinese undergarment styles – one each for Guan Yinping, Diaochan, Sun Shangxiang, Lu Lingqi, Wang Yi, and Wang Yuanji.

PS4:
Amazon: http://amzn.to/2ErLjhH
Gamestop: http://bit.ly/2ErFJvU (Gets Exclusive Limited Edition Steelbook while supplies last)
BestBuy: http://bit.ly/2EqiPVD
EB Games Canada: http://bit.ly/2EqnWVY

Xbox One:
Amazon: http://amzn.to/2EsTquF
Gamestop: http://bit.ly/2EqWvLP (Gets Exclusive Limited Edition Steelbook while supplies last)
BestBuy: http://bit.ly/2EqJ7qM
EB Games Canada: http://bit.ly/2EpceL2

PlayStation Store - Will have an early purchase bonus(same as pre-order bonuses) on Launch Day 2/13. (No Digital Pre-order)

PC Steam version will be listed on Launch day with an early purchase bonus!

Digital Pre-orders for #DW9 #DynastyWarriors9 on Xbox Store is now up. 
Standard: http://bit.ly/2GHTpVq : 
Digital Deluxe: http://bit.ly/2GIXPv8
